name: Aspects of change
description:
The leo fairy stole your front door key, find it!



You are an aspect of change, a being able to attune to different signs at will. Use this power to avoid deadly objects in your house.
Certain objects (such as lights and dog toys) might react badly if you have certain horoscope signs . you must change to different signs when walking near these objects in order to avoid an unlucky death.



The game features delightful and heartwarming visuals followed by a care for detail and game design. The game also features a timer mechanic for added replayability. Try to beat your friends on this exciting new challenge

Good luck!
